attributes.action: force manufacturers of disposible nappies to make them bio degradable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: force disposable nappy producers to make them from bio degradable materials and stopping the disgraceful practise of using materials that take 500 years to dissapear. Think how many of these nappies are produced every year and the savings that could be made on landfill.
